title: gamebreaking bug
body: if you use seraphs embrace active (the shield) and hourglass active at the same time you dont get the shield from seraphs and it goes on cd.

replies.body: Yea I agree, yes it may be a bug, but one to minor for anyone to care. Best to keep these things to yourself.

This is not a "gamebreaking bug". Im not even sure its a bug to be honest, i have never seen anyone use a shield during zhonyas. And there is no point in even using seraphs during zhonyas. The shield lasts 3 seconds, zhonyas lasts 2.5, you will be getting 0.5 seconds of effective use out of the shield, which you may as well use either after or before using zhonyas.
